means: Western Humor and Irony Membership 西部幽默和讽刺成员

sentence.Network_en: We decided, more or less on a whim, to sail to Morocco.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们多少有点心血来潮，决定航海去摩洛哥。

sentence.Network_en: Lately, the president has been sacking and picking new ministers at whim.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近，总统一时兴起频频解雇旧部长，选任新部长。

sentence.Network_en: Dozens of servants had catered to his every whim.
sentence.Network_cn: 几十个仆人迎合他所有稀奇古怪的念头。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以w开头的英语英文单词 ... whilst 同…同时；然而 whim 多变，怪念头 whimper 悲嗥，鸣咽.
石油英语词汇(W2)|生物化学专业英语词汇 ... while 一会儿；当…的时候；而 whim 幻想；卷扬机 whine 呜呜声；哀诉；牢骚.
词根联想记忆法词汇教程（八）_在线英语听力室 ... wheedle v. 劝诱，哄骗 whim n. 奇想 whir v. 急速旋转.
Without this , the divine will is simply irrational whim ., 离开了这点 , 神的意志将只是没有理性的心血来潮.

list.abs: Without this , the divine will is simply irrational whim ., 离开了这点 , 神的意志将只是没有理性的心血来潮.
I had a sudden whim to take a walk ., 我突然想去散步.
A sudden whim to buy a cream cake ., 去买奶油蛋糕的一个突然的怪念头.
fancy : the mental faculty through which whims , visions , and fantasies are summoned up ; imagination , especially a whimsical or fantastic nature .想象力：心智机能，能产生想法、幻想、想象；想象，尤指有异想天开或空想的特性的。
His mother spoiled him indulging his every whim ., 他的妈妈溺爱他 , 总是满足他的各种要求.
He dotes on his grandchildren and indulges their every whim ., 他溺爱自己的孙辈 , 并且满足他们的任何想法.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: of unknown origin. Sense 2 (mid 18th cent.) is a transferred use

entry.tran: 一时的兴致;心血来潮;突发的奇想
entry.def: A whim is a wish to do or have something which seems to have no serious reason or purpose behind it, and often occurs suddenly.

example.ex: We decided, more or less on a whim, to sail to Morocco...
example.tran: 我们多少有点心血来潮，决定航海去摩洛哥。

example.ex: The premium can increase at the whim of the insurers...
example.tran: 保险公司可以随时提高保费。

means.word_mean: 2. an odd or fanciful or capricious idea;

sentences.sentence: "the theatrical notion of disguise is associated with disaster in his stories"
"he had a whimsy about flying to the moon"
"whimsy can be humorous to someone with time to enjoy it"

auth_sentence.content: The whim seized him to drive me to Montaza.
auth_sentence.res_content: The whim seized him to drive me to Montaza.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The whim seized him to drive me to Montaza.

auth_sentence.content: Everything we see is the designer's whim.
auth_sentence.res_content: Everything we see is the designer's whim.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Everything we see is the designer's whim.

auth_sentence.content: But what of an indiscreet picture posted on a whim?
auth_sentence.res_content: But what of an indiscreet picture posted on a whim?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But what of an indiscreet picture posted on a whim?

means.word_mean: 一时的兴致, 突然的念头, 突发奇想, 异想天开

sentences.en: She bought that dress on a whim.
sentences.cn: 她一时心血来潮就买了那件连衣裙。
